本件保存七年
C2-62- 1704
May 30, 2
1
MEMORANDUM
To
: Mr. R. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, US AID/C
From
: C. C. Chang Original signed by Chief, Second Division, CUSA C. C. Chang
Subject : Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX (99-471)
Reference is made to the attached Report of Excess Equipment and copy of JGWhite letter dated May 26, 1962 File Ref. MSA-33.4.
In the above letter, JGwhite recommended that 54 voltmetery be procured. If you concur and they are avail- able, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan.
Incl. Report
Copy of JGWhite letter
cc:
JGWhite
BES (with copy of JGWhite letter)
